name: Sparks & Jorge (demo)
description:
Sparks & Jorge was made for the UNC 2022 Game Jam! 

It's a small narrative based platformer I hope to expand on in the future into a full game!

This is my first published game & my first project to go past prototyping!

There's a couple bugs when it comes to the dialogue, when it pops up try to stay still and use "Enter" to advance through it

Both Sparks and Jorge have a story I hope to tell but, in the meantime, enjoy this snippet of them! :)

CONTROLS:

WASD or arrow keys - to move

Q - deploy Jorge

Enter - advance through dialogue

CREDITS:

art, music & coding - me!

sound effects - sourced from zapsplash.com!

EDIT: 12:01am/04/04/22 added screenshots!
